content.rendered: Testing, Experts, Passion and Perfection are four pillars of TestingXperts. TestingXperts’ brand aligns with the vision of the company, which is aimed at becoming the largest and most trusted Specialist QA and Testing provider globally. ‘X’ in TestingXperts symbolizes X factor in TestingXperts. X Factor – this is a noun in the English dictionary and means ‘a noteworthy special talent or quality’. TestingXperts has positioned itself as a Specialist and Technical Testing provider and differentiates itself from Traditional Testing Providers. Tx symbolizes the equivalent of medical prescriptions meaning we provide health assessment for Software. ‘X’ has been stretched into a ‘Q’ to demonstrate our expertise in QA.
